alert.note: Alert for Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:01PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sioux, southeastern Niobrara and north central Goshen Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 700 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rawhide Buttes, or 9 miles south of Lusk, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Sioux, southeastern Niobrara and north central Goshen Counties, including the following locations... Van Tassell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM MDT for east central Wyoming.
